overview:
Michael Carter, is a passionate Brand Raconteur and Agent Provocateur on behalf of all his clients. He works tirelessly to help his clients to tell their best professional and personal brand stories through his LeapAgents platform.

As lead Recruiter his focus is helping his clients to recruit, attract and hire the very best talent. As lead Corporate Coach, he helps his corporate clients deliver their brand promise to employees, clients and to themselves company leaders. As Personal Coach, he is totally committed to helping his client to successfully evaluate, build and manage their own personal brands.
